recipes.name: Skinny Orange Chicken
recipes.instructions:
Season chicken generously with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and saute for about 4-6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is browned and nearly cooked through. Pour in the orange chicken sauce, and stir to combine. Let the sauce come to a boil, then boil for an additional minute or two until thickened. Remove from heat and serve immediately over rice. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.

Sauce:

Whisk all ingredients together until combined.
